, pl. 1 (Post Office Bay , Santa María I. [ Charles I. ], Galápagos Is). Holotype (unique), CAS 5744 .

Snyder 1904: 521
, pl. 6 (fig. 12) ( Auau Channel , between Maui I. and Lanai I. , Hawaiian Is. , Albatross sta. 3874, 21–28 fm). Holotype (unique), USNM 50871 .

( South of Leton Rock , Atlantic , 15°40'01"N , 23°05'08"W , 38 fm). Holotype (unique), ZMB 9776 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Channomuraena Richardson 1848: 96
. Type species
Ichthyophis vittatus Richardson 1845
, by monotypy. Feminine.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cirrimaxilla Chen & Shao 1995: 328
. Type species
Cirrimaxilla formosa Chen & Shao 1995
, by original designation (also monotypic). Feminine.
